svg.text: SHIPPING LABEL LAYOUT DIAGRAM — labelRenderer.js (Current Code)
Thermal/Standard Format: 100mm x auto | All dimensions in mm (px at 96dpi)
Total: ~80mm content height (no fixed height — grows with content)
Thermal: 100mm x auto | @page: 100mm auto | 1 label per sheet
Standard: 100mm x auto | @page: 100mm auto | 1 label per sheet
2-in-1: 137mm x 200mm | @page: A4 (210x297) | 2 labels per A4 page (flex row, gap: 3mm)
4-in-1: 98mm x 137mm | @page: A4 (210x297) | 4 labels per A4 page (2x2 grid, gap: 3mm)
File: backend/services/labelRenderer.js | Class: LabelRenderer | Method: generateLabelHTML() + combineLabels()
